content.text: Leesa is a journalist and content creator whose work has appeared in several print and web publications. Her diverse background in the entertainment and lifestyle industries spans editorial, marketing, television production, casting, and talent development. Leesa was raised in New York but currently calls South Florida home. You can follow her @LeesaDavis on Twitter.

primary.title: Want more?
primary.description: Sign up for our newsletter for more articles and guides
